thread.title: The Toronto Indepedent Music Awards announce this year's nominees
thread.title_full: The Toronto Indepedent Music Awards announce this year's nominees | Examiner.com

author: Ryan Ayukawa
title: The Toronto Indepedent Music Awards announce this year's nominees
text:
Play Toronto Independent Music Awards 2014 at Tattoo in Toronto, Ontario. Coverage by V-MIX on OMNI OMNI video On October 6, the Toronto Independent Music Awards announced their list of nominees for 2015. The eleven categories of awards are Best Folk or Roots, Best Singer-Songwriter, Best Adult Contemporary, Best Jazz Vocal, Best Jazz Instrumental, Best Urban, Best International or World, Best International, Best Young-Songwriter, Best Country, Best Out-of Province, Best Alternative or Indie, Best Pop, Best World, Best USA, Best overall EPK sponsored by Sonicbids. A one-night festival with names of the winners, along with live performances will be held at the Revival (783 College St.) on October 23.
TIMA website - used with permission The TIMAs began as an annual song competition designed to support independent Canadian musicians through recognition, prizes, and industry networking. They recently switched to a festival format. Over eleven years, the TIMAs have given away over $300,000 in custom prize packaged.
Details for the October 23 festival night continue to be released to media and public. The grand jury is currently listed as Alan Cross (music broadcaster), Hill Kourkoutis (musician, producer), Andreas Kalogiannides (Co-chair of the Toronto Music Advisory Council), and Ari Kaplan (Paper Bag Records).
TIMA 2015 live performers at the Revival include JoJo Worthington (TIMA 2014 grand prize winner), Dani Strong (country musician), OSIYM (rap group), Jutes, The Nursery. Several independent artists will also perform short sets.
Prizes for the TIMAs 2015 vary depending on award category. They include Yangaroo radio distribution, a 3-song EP, radio promotion, and TIMA catalog placement.
For the complete list of TIMA 2015 nominees visit here .
Advance tickets to the TIMA 2015 Friday October 23 event are available via TicketFly .
For more Toronto music Examiner articles visit here .
